Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
August 2023 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

Greetings, fabulous Justia family! We are thrilled to present another round of exciting updates as our teams continue to maintain Justia's position as a leading company offering top-notch services for lawyers and law firms. Thank you for all your hard work. Let's continue to grow together and achieve great heights!

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Short Videos (Legal Content). We produced and uploaded a new short video about Sales Agreements (Mexican Law) to our Justia YouTube Channel.

Justia Legal Guides Video. We produced our first video in the Justia Legal Guides series. The video is dedicated to giving an overview of Family Law and was added to our Justia YouTube Channel.

Data and IT. A huge accomplishment that has been in the works for several months now is the reduction of our infrastructure costs through the analysis and implementation of cost optimization strategies. These efforts will be ongoing since the goal is to always keep our spend under control.

Free Law. We’ve added headless crawling as part of our data extraction toolbox. Headless browsers are used to simulate a real user interacting with the site, allowing us to obtain a more complete version of the source pages.

QA Automation. The QA Team continues expanding our automated QA coverage. They released support for our Justia Elevate Yoast implementation. They also improved their security audit report by adding filtering options, which soon will be available in other QA reports.

Data. We continue migrating our tracking to Google Analytics 4 by adding support for “Click to Call” and “Click to Text” events in all our client properties, including their AMP versions.

Justia Elevate Reports. This month we also transitioned the SEO Reports for legacy Justia Elevate clients from Universal Google Analytics to Google Analytics 4.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Justia Legal Dictionary. We continued to refine our dictionary's contents and look and feel before launch.
  • More 50-State Surveys. We wrote surveys on dram shop laws (drunk driving-related) for the Car Accidents Center, fair debt collection laws for the Debt Relief & Management Center, and drug possession laws for the Criminal Law Center.
  • Maryland and West Virginia Courts. We updated the content for these case law pages following each state's recent changes to its court system.
  • Justia Mexico Portal. Our team updated the legal information about Telework in the Labor Law Center on the Justia Mexico Portal. We also updated the Political Constitution of the United Mexican States; this legal resource is easy to navigate and read for anyone visiting our portal.

JUSTIA PET NEWS

Mischievous Miau Miau

Let me introduce “Miau Miau,” also known as “Micholin.” He is very curious and skittish. He loves jumping around the house and sleeping. He also loves to mess around with his dog siblings. His favorite activity is meowing when his human is in meetings.

- Eduardo Garcia

TEAM ACTIVITY

Justia Bingo 2.0

Last Friday was a blast with Justia Bingo 2.0! We laughed, we cheered, and the excitement was off the charts! The competition was on from the very first callout, and everyone eagerly awaited the next call. However, it wasn't just about winning; it was about the shared experience of having a great time together. We are all looking forward to some more fun-filled activities like this!

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Genaro Osoria, Haydee Garcia, Jorge Contreras, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Omar Carreon, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
